data.title: Hassan Name Meaning in English & Urdu, Origin, Luck Number
data.meta_description: Hassan is a Muslim Arabic baby boy name. Its meaning is "Very Handsome, Beautifier". Hassan name origin is Arabic. Write Hassan in Urdu, Hindi, Arabic, Bangla : حسن, हस्सन, حسان,حسن, হাসান., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Hassan Name Meaning in English

What does the name Hassan mean? What is the meaning of the name Hassan, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Means "handsome", derived from Arabic حسن (hasuna) "to be beautiful, to be good". Hasan was the son of Ali and the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad. He was poisoned by one of his wives and is regarded as a martyr by Shia Muslims. This was also the name of two kings of Morocco.

Hassan Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Very handsome, beautifier Details: From the Arabic hasan, meaning "good" or "beautiful". Gender: Boy Origin: Arabic Religion: Muslim Suitable for: Boys / Male / Guys Hardness: Medium hard to pronounce Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Not very short Syllables: 6 Letters and 1 Words

Hassan Name Lucky Number 9

Hassan Name Numerology And Personality

Hassan has the numerology 9. The meaning of this name is Very handsome, beautifier. People with numerology number 9 are the people who are thought to be very selfless and very kind towards the people and everyone around them. These are the people who are always thinking of others over themselves and they take care of everyone around them.

These people believe in creative expression and that is one reason why they are thought to be very humanitarian. The gender of this name Hassan is Boy. They always think of what they can do for the humanity.

The religion is Muslim. These are the people who are very obligatory of everything and they also only believe in giving and you will definitely never find these people in takers because they are always the givers. They do not wait for others to do things for them so that they can do it in return rather they are first one to make a move.
